name: FILMARKET HUB
slogan: Online marketplace for film & series in development. We match projects with companies
description:
Filmarket Hub is the first online marketplace for films and series in development. We are experts in matching international projects with producers, TV broadcasters, VOD platforms, sales agents and distributors. It's a perfect tool to discover excellent scripts or find financing partners, with more than 20.000 filmmakers from all over Europe and Latin America.

#WeBelieve: 
Filmmakers must have the time and tools to make their ideas happen.
Filmmakers should devote their energy to create new work, not promoting it.
The best talent should connect with the right opportunities to be discovered.
Great work should spread across the globe, gaining the exposure it deserves.
Creative careers must be free from barriers and bureaucracy.

The company's headquarters are located in Barcelona (Spain) and we are currently looking to expand the platform internationally. 

Web-site http://www.filmarkethub.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Filmarkethub
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FilmarketHub

jobs.title: Sales Manager Junior
jobs.description:
We are looking for an expert in the following fields:

- Facebook Ads and Audiences
- Data handling and interpretation
- Email marketing
- Audience segmentation / database management
- Intercom (the software)

If you specialize in these five things, it doesn't matter that you are a Junior, we will teach you the rest. Adapting the language to the world of cinema

Requirements

- Mastering the 5 fields mentioned
- Mastering the Spanish language to perfection
- Mastering the English language to perfection

Please, if you do not comply with these requirements do not apply to this work proposal
